action: List all members of a group or project

id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group.

query.description: Filter by name, email, or username (partial values allowed).

user_ids.description: Filter the results on the given user IDs.

skip_users.description: Exclude users with the given user IDs from the results.

action: Add a member to a group or project

id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group.

user_id.description: The user ID of the new member, or multiple IDs separated by commas. Required if 'username' is not provided.

username.description: The username of the new member, or multiple usernames separated by commas. Required if 'user_id' is not provided.

invite_source.description: Source of the invitation that starts the member creation process.

member_role_id.description: Ultimate only. The ID of a custom member role.

action: Edit a member of a group or project

id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group.

user_id.description: The user ID of the member.

member_role_id.description: Ultimate only. The ID of a custom member role. If omitted, removes all roles.

action: Remove a member from a group or project

id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group.

user_id.description: The user ID of the member.

skip_subresources.description: Whether to skip deleting the member's direct memberships in subgroups and projects. Default is false.

unassign_issuables.description: Whether the removed member should be unassigned from issues or merge requests in the group or project. Default is false.
